name: Coherent Solutions
tag_list: software-development-outsourcing, offshore-software-development, software-development, software, offshore, outsourcing
overview:
Since 1995, Coherent Solutions has helped clients reduce development and maintenance costs and bring products and complex applications to market faster. With experienced teams in the U.S. and Eastern Europe, the company’s model yields superior results as it combines expertise in commercial grade software development, a proven global delivery model, and a passionate commitment to client success.

Coherent Solutions delivers its services through a combination of U.S.-based resources and offshore resources located in its Development Center in Minsk. Its outsourcing model delivers better value and relies on two key components: (1) value added U.S. delivery management and (2) integration and transparency across the service delivery supply chain. Coherent Solutions™ model promotes flexibility in serving its clients. This approach allows customers to choose the distribution of resources that best fits the needs of their business and technology environment. Delivery capabilities in the U.S. include project management, business analysis, architecture, and design. Delivery capabilities offshore focus on architecture, design, development, and testing activities.
